sen.e: It is the sequel to "Fuyu no Hi" (Winter Days), and also had people who had lived in Owari Province as its participants.

sen.j: 重五が庵、野水亭などにおける歌仙、58の発句をおさめる。
sen.e: It has kasen (renga sequences of thirty-six verses) and fifty-eight hokku (first lines of renga sequences) composed at places such as Jugo's hermitage and Yasui's bower.

sen.j: そのなかには、松尾芭蕉の「古池や」の句ほか2句を含んでいる。
sen.e: Among them, the 'Furu ike ya' (Old pond) poem by Basho MATSUO and two other verses by him are included.
